summary: This is an email from June 3, 2008, containing a draft indictment against Jeffrey Epstein. The email includes two attachments: a version with a 'draft' watermark and a version with the watermark removed.

events.title: Draft Indictment Email
events.description: An email is sent containing a draft indictment against Jeffrey Epstein, with two versions of the document attached.

keyFacts: A draft indictment against Jeffrey Epstein was circulated via email on June 3, 2008.
Two versions of the indictment were attached: one with a 'draft' watermark and one without.
The email indicates the document was being prepared for official use, as the watermark was removed in the second version.
